DataElement.preferredDefinition: Identifier that represents the relationship of the associated person(s) to the related subject.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Related Subjects Dataset Subject, Device, or Study Relationship
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A dataset used to represent relationships between study subjects. (CDISC)_A qualifier to describe the relationships of the associated person(s) to the related subject or pool of subjects, to the related device, or to the study.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A dataset used to represent relationships between study subjects. (CDISC)

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The terminology subset that includes terms relevant to the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium (CDISC) variables._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.
